snippet: Laurie Jon Moran, at Le Bernardin, and Joseph Murphy, at Jean Georges, step into prominent roles.
abstract: Laurie Jon Moran is the new pastry chef at Le Bernardin restaurant, replacing Michael Laiskoni, and Joseph Murphy has taken over for Johnny Iuzzini at Jean Georges; both chefs plan to maintain continuity in their new, high-profile positions while also bringing personal touches to the job.
lead_paragraph: Laurie Jon Moran, at Le Bernardin, and Joseph Murphy, at Jean Georges, step into prominent roles.

headline.seo: New Pastry Chefs at Le Bernardin and Jean Georges
headline.main: New Pastry Chefs at Le Bernardin and Jean Georges
headline.print_headline: New Pastry Chefs at Le Bernardin and Jean Georges
